summary: This is an email exchange from January 12, 2007, containing flight information for a Continental Airlines flight from Newark, NJ to St. Thomas Island, U.S. Virgin Islands on January 13, 2007. The email is sent to an unnamed recipient and appears to be arranging travel, likely for an Epstein employee or associate.

persons.name: Epstein Employee
persons.context: The email is addressed to an 'Epstein Employee' and contains flight information for travel from Newark to St. Thomas Island.

events.title: Flight to St. Thomas Island
events.description: A Continental Airlines flight from Newark, NJ to St. Thomas Island, U.S. Virgin Islands, arranged via email.

locations: St Thomas Island Cyril E King (STT)
keyFacts: Flight was booked for January 13, 2007 from Newark to St. Thomas Island.
The email is addressed to an 'Epstein Employee'.
A car service ('citicar') was arranged to pick up the traveler at 7:30am.
The flight was on Continental Airlines, economy class, Boeing 737-700.
The email exchange shows coordination of travel for an Epstein associate.
